title: Adding a new todo form: Vue events, methods, and models
summary: Excellent. We can now add todo items to our form! Our app is now starting to feel interactive, but one issue is that we've completely ignored its look and feel up to now. In the next article, we'll concentrate on fixing this, looking at the different ways Vue provides to style components.
short_title: Adding a new todo form: Vue events, methods, and models
